cards.name: Fidelity Rewards Visa Signature
cards.description: My daily card for many years. It does require a Fidelity account for best use, but since I use Fidelity as a one-stop shop, it made sense for me to also use their credit card. Once it is setup, cashback is automatically deposited into my Fidelity account.
pros: Cashback automatically deposited into Fidelity account.
cons: Requires a Fidelity Cash Management or brokerage account.
No special categories for cash back.
The payment website has a terrible user interface.

cards.name: Citi Double Cash
cards.description: My secondary card for many years. Very easy to use.
cons: No special categories for cash back.

cards.name: Capital One Secured Mastercard
cards.description: When I first arrived in the US, this was the first card I got to establish a credit history. Unlike some other secured cards, this card is free to apply for and has no associated fees. You can put down a deposit to increase your credit limit. Use this card for a year and then you can apply for an unsecured card.
pros: Cashback automatically deposited into Fidelity account.
